title.narrative: Multi-sector waste management development to reduce the emission of unintentional persistent organic pollutants (POPs) and polychlorinated biphenyl ethers (PBDEs)

description.narrative: ..The objective of this project is to protect the human health and the environment through the establishment of an environmentally sound management system of unintentional POPs (uPOPs) and polychlorinated biphenyls ethers (PBDEs) and final disposal of 1000 tons of possibly PBDE/POPs containing industrial and hazardous waste
